entry.title: Today in DeFi - US Passes Crypto Bills, Lido Proposes stETH Governance, gDAI Hedging, and more...
entry.summary: US Passes Crypto Bills On Wednesday, the US House Financial Services Committee passed six bills that provide consumer protections and legislative clarity for digital assets. Among all six bills, the Technology for the 21st Century Act is considered positive for crypto as it provides a reasonable regulation framework for crypto assets.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - zkSync EraLend Hacked, Optimism L2 PGN Live, Quest to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: zkSync EraLend Hacked zkSync Era-based lending protocol EraLend was exploited and lost ~2.76m due to a re-entrancy attack. The team has temporarily paused borrowing, USDC supply, and SyncSwap LP supply while investigating and tracing the lost funds.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Factor V2 Live on Arbitrum, Thena Alpha on BnB Chain, Delta-Neutral Options LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Factor V2 Live on Arbitrum Arbitrum-based yield protocol Factor launched V2 with initial strategies for TradeJoe, Mux, and GMX vaults. Factor launches v2 staking rewards. Thena Alpha on BnB Chain BnB Chain-based DEX Thena.fi launches its perp trading platform Alpha. Alpha supports 100 assets with up to 40x leverage and has zero funding rates.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Worldcoin Live, Chainlink CCIP, Mantle L2 Mainnet, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of July 17th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - GHO Liquidity Pools, Worldcoin Migrates to OP Mainnet, Fixed-rate Lending on Aave, and more...
entry.summary: GHO Liquidity Pools The first three GHO LP pools are now live on Balancer, including $GHO / bb-a-USD, $wstETH / $GHO (80/20), and $GHO / $LUSD. Worldcoin Migrates to OP Mainnet UBI project Worldcoin has completed migration to the OP mainnet and has begun migrating users of World ID and World App.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Polkadot 1.0 Realized, DeFi Saver Supports CurveUSD, Lend to Earn and more...
entry.summary: Polkadot 1.0 Realized Polkadot released the complete version of its 1.0. The Polkadot codebase is now functionally complete and has been handed over to the community with the launch of Polkadot OpenGov and the migration of all runtime code to a repository managed by the Technical Fellowship.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Pendle Earn Live, Axelar Interchain Token, Cross-chain Borrowing, and more...
entry.summary: Pendle Earn Live Pendle launches Pendle Earn. Pendle Earn earns fixed yields on major assets including stablecoins and LSTs, lowering the barrier to access DeFi yields. Axelar Interchain Token Service Axelar introduces Interchain Token Service (ITS), supporting Interchain Tokens that preserve cross-chain fungibility and custom functionality. ITS allows teams to easily manage supply and features through the creation of Interchain Tokens.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Mantle Mainnet Live, UniswapX Live, Testnet Yield Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Mantle Mainnet Live Built by BitDAO, Mantle L2 mainnet alpha is now live, as well as the BIT-MNT conversion tool. Mantle also launches a grants program and an EcoFund to support developments. The next step for Mantle is to build mntETH - Mantle's LSD product.

entry.summary: Recap: Week of July 10th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ripple Wins SEC Case, Polygon POL Token, Leveraged Lending, and more...
entry.summary: Ripple Wins SEC Case After a year long of dispute between Ripple and the SEC on whether the XRP token is a security, a US judge ruled that institutional XRP sales were investment contracts, but programmatic sales were not. "The programmatic portion of the ruling could have broad impact for other crypto tokens, though the

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Starknet v0.12 Mainnet, Kava 14 Live, Leverage Trading on Optimism, ...
entry.summary: Starknet v0.12 Mainnet Starknet launches the v0.12 upgrade to its mainnet, increases throughput by 10x, and marks the Quant Leap upgrade's beginning - providing enhanced performance and scalability. Kava 14 Live Kava 14 is live on mainnet. The â€˜internal bridgeâ€™ in the upgrade enables users to transfer native IBC assets from Cosmos to EVM ecosystems.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - ConsenSys Linea Alpha, Rodeo Exploit, Native BTC Bridging, ...
entry.summary: Linea Mainnet Alpha ConsenSys L2 Linea launches mainnet alpha and starts to onboard launch partners. Linea will open the network to the public next week at EthCC. In the launch post, Linea claims there is no token as it uses ETH as the network currency.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Stader ETHx Live, Swaap V2 Live, Make esGMX Liquid, and more...
entry.summary: Stader ETHx Live Stader launches ETHx along with $1M in launch incentives. The incentives include a 1.5x staking boost, 800k in LP rewards, and rewards for DAOs & communities. Swaap V2 Live Market-making protocol Swaap launches v2 on Ethereum and Polygon. V2 introduces enhancements for LPs, such as optimized market-making strategies, partnerships with institutions, incentives for early participation, etc.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Multichain Stopped Services, Blur V2 Live, Compound Encumber, and More...

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Multichain Hacked, SEC Going After DeFi, Quest to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Multichain Stops All Services Multichain was hacked and has announced it has stopped all services. All bridge transactions will be stuck on the source chain with unknown resume time. Earlier today Multichain bridge contracts saw major outflows due to potential exploits. â€œ

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Blur V2 Live, Surge Live on Arbitrum, Earn on Liquidity, and more...
entry.summary: Blur V2 Live NFT marketplace Blur launches V2, enabling 50% gas reduction and trait bidding for NFTs. Surge Live on Arbitrum Surge is now live on Arbitrum. Surge is a lending protocol for longtail assets, built by the founder of Inverse. Pendle Live on BnB Chain

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Sommelier Morpho Integration, PancakeSwap on Polygon zkEVM, Crosschain Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Sommelier Morpho Integration Yield protocol Sommelier integrates Morpho to launch the RYETH and RYUSD vaults, using Morphon's optimizer to enhance returns. PancakeSwap on Polygon zkEVM PancakeSwap has been deployed on Polygon zkEVM (with swap feature supported) and joined Linea's testnet campaign.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Archway L1 Live, stUSDT Live, crvUSD, Borrowing on Curve, and more...
entry.summary: Archway L1 Live Archway, a Cosmos-based L1 with incentives for devs, has launched its mainnet. Archway plans to distribute a portion of the token emission directly to dApps. It will allocate 25% to devs and the remaining 75% to validators. stUSDT Live

entry.title: Today In DeFi - SMG Halts Ethereum (for 12s), Polygon 2.0 Architecture, Stable farms and more
